author: April
content:
Until you pointed it out, I had no idea this image was created with a supplemental flash.

And once you pointed it out, I'm thinking of all the times I might have benefited from using a little fill flash, if I only knew how. ðŸ˜‰

The on-camera flash for my D300 is now set for Rear Synch @ 1/250s, TTL, Modeling On, Flash shutter speed 1/15s. I know there were good reasons for each of those settings, but can't remember now what they were...
